title: My phone works perfectly fine when I'm not plugged in, but it reboots as soon as I charge it.
content: My phone works perfectly fine when I'm not plugged in, but it reboots as soon as I charge it. As soon as it displays the lock screen, it just reboots again. It continues on forever unless I unplug the phone. The phone is charging while it's plugged in, but it's rendered completely unusable
